descHumanitarianObjective.en: Humanitarian objective of program is such and such.

en.registered: You have been successfully registered for this program.
en.included: You have been included in this program.
en.rejected: Unfortunately we have to inform you that you will not receive any (more) payments for this program. If you have questions, please contact us.
en.whatsappPayment:
This is a message from the Red Cross.
Your €35 Albert Heijn supermarket voucher is ready to be sent.
Please reply “yes” to this message in order to receive the voucher.
en.whatsappReply: For further questions please contact this number
en.whatsappVoucher:
This is a message from the Red Cross.
You are receiving this supermarket voucher because you are currently on the Loket waiting list for Shelter in Amsterdam and you applied for support from the Red Cross. The value of this voucher is €35. This amount can be spent at any Albert Heijn supermarket in the Netherlands.
You don’t have to spend everything at once. So keep this voucher in your phone and re-use it until the amount is finished.
To use the voucher, choose what you want to buy and let the cashier scan the voucher on your phone.
More information about the supermarket voucher is here: https://example.org

label.en: My full name: (Including first, second and last-names)
My V number: (It needs to be 10 digits long)
Number to reach me via SMS: (It should look like: +31 6 00 00 00 00)
